original_text: When anyone hears the message about the kingdom and does not understand it, the evil one comes and snatches away what was sown in their heart. This is the seed sown along the path.
korean_text: 아무나 천국 말씀을 듣고 깨닫지 못할 때는 악한 자가 와서 그 마음에 뿌려진 것을 빼앗나니 이는 곧 길 가에 뿌려진 자요

sentences.original_text: When anyone hears the message about the kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 하나님 나라에 대한 메시지를 들을 때

sentences.original_text: and snatches away what was sown in their heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 마음에 심어진 것을 빼앗아 갑니다

sentences.original_text: This is the seed sown along the path
